title: ISic004401. I.Sicily inscription 004401
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]CD[---]A[..]MPORIBUS
2[---]OINDOMCD[---..]NTIFICISPATRISEPISOC
3[---]XITUSSU[---]IO[··.]OMINUSDO
4[---]EN[---.]ONORISSE

Apparatus criticus

Text of Rizzone; Rizzone suggests alternatively: [sancte fidei ca]tolice

translation

commentary
